channel.title: Homo Explosion!
channel.description: A podcast for GLEEks by a GLEEk. Homo Explosion is dedicated to the FOX musical comedy GLEE. Episode reviews, spoilers, rumors, music, quotes and general rants and raves! Join Chevy (and various guest hosts) and let the GLEEk flag fly!
channel.itunes:author: Chevy Carter
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast for GLEEks by a GLEEk. Homo Explosion is a GLEE podcast that features episode reviews, spoilers, news, rumors, music, quotes and general rants and raves. Join Chevy (and his various guest co-hosts) and unleash the GLEEk within!

item.title: Just Smile (and JUMP!)
item.description: Flying solo this week! Aside from my review of "Mattress", I take a look at a few preview clips from "Sectionals" and discuss how freakingly awesome it would be if Idina Menzel came on the show.
item.itunes:author: Chevy Carter
item.itunes:summary: Flying solo this week! Aside from my review of "Mattress", I take a look at a few preview clips from "Sectionals" and discuss how freakingly awesome it would be if Idina Menzel came on the show.
item.itunes:subtitle: Review of "Mattress" and preview of the mid-season finale, "Sectionals"

item.title: Thankful for Glee!
item.description: Happy Thanksgiving! This week my mom joins me as co-host to review the last two episodes, "Ballad" and "Hairography". We also discuss the Glee cast version of "Last Christmas" and how alike Puck and my brother are.
item.itunes:author: Chevy Carter
item.itunes:summary: Happy Thanksgiving! This week my mom joins me as co-host to review the last two episodes, "Ballad" and "Hairography". We also discuss the Glee cast version of "Last Christmas" and how alike Puck and my brother are.
item.itunes:subtitle: Reviews of "Ballad" and "Hairography" and a clip of the cast's version of "Last Christmas"

item.title: MASH-up!
item.description: My first guest-host, Taylor, joins me in looking at Glee from the pilot to the newest episode. We discuss our favorite (and least favorite) characters, the best (and worst) musical numbers and where we want the series to go.
item.itunes:author: Chevy Carter
item.itunes:summary: My first guest-host, Taylor, joins me in looking at Glee from the pilot to the newest episode. We discuss our favorite (and least favorite) characters, the best (and worst) musical numbers and where we want the series to go.

item.title: Wheelchairs and Cupcakes and Tears, OH MY!
item.description: In this inaugural podcast episode, I review "Wheels", discuss the second upcoming Glee soundtrack and share two songs that I would LOVE to hear on the show.
item.itunes:author: Chevy Carter
item.itunes:summary: In this inaugural podcast episode, I review "Wheels", discuss the second upcoming Glee soundtrack and share two songs that I would LOVE to hear on the show.
